bank

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • bank.Account

  • public class Account
extends Object
    An Account holds the balances and positions for one account.
    Author:
    Kyle

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      String accountID
      Local account ID.
      String accountType
      Type of account.
      Float availableBalance
      Balance of account available for trading.
      Float cashBalance
      Cash balance of account.
      Float initialBalance
      Initial balance of account.
      Float nonPartitionedBalance
      Balance of account not partitioned to sub-Accounts.
      String owner
      Owner of this Account.
      HashMap<String,Position> positions
      Positions of account, mapped to their symbol.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Account()
      Constructs an empty account with no identification.
      Account(BalancesAndPositions bandp)
      Constructs an Account based on the given bandp.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Account

        public Account()
        Constructs an empty account with no identification.

      • Account

        public Account(BalancesAndPositions bandp)
        Constructs an Account based on the given bandp.

        Only used for broker accounts at the Bank level.

        Parameters:
        bandp - the BalancesAndPositions this Account should be made from.
        See Also:
        BalancesAndPositions
